article: No sports, no life. Sports are very important to us. Sports help us to keep in good  _  and get good grades. Everyone in our class  _  sports. Our favorite  _  is P.E. We only have P.E.  _  a week, but we play sports every day. The most popular sport in our class is basketball. The boys enjoy  _  it, and many of the  _  like it, too. Football is also popular. When the weather is  _  , we often play football outside. We  _  play volleyball. We think it is boring. There is a basketball team in our class. Our team often has matches with other teams. When there is a match, many of us go to  watch  it. It's very  _  .
